name: Mariusz Jan Skobel
profile_summary:
Senior Casino Engineer with over 10 years of experience specializing in data-driven strategies and performance optimization within the casino industry. Proven track record in project management and campaign management, leveraging **Excel**, **Power BI**, and various **CRM** tools to drive actionable insights and enhance communication across teams. Skilled in negotiation and presentations, effectively fostering stakeholder engagement to achieve common goals.

Brings a strong technical background as a Full Stack Developer with hands-on experience in **JavaScript/TypeScript**, **Python**, and **Flutter**, utilizing frameworks such as **React**, **Next.js**, **Vue**, **Node.js**, **FastAPI**, and **Django**. Adept in cloud-native application development on **Azure** and **AWS**, significantly contributing to enterprise platforms that harness AI/ML capabilities for real-time analytics and automation. Experienced in microservices architecture and CI/CD automation, ensuring compliance with standards like HIPAA, FHIR, PCI DSS, and SOC 2. Passionate about creating impactful systems that are both technically robust and aligned with business objectives.
